Description / Notes:
**Purpose.** Continuously replicate source database changes (inserts, updates, deletes) into Snowflake with low latency so downstream models always work from current data.
**Scope.** CDC is used for operational sources exposing changelogs (e.g., WAL/binlog/redo) or change tables. Complements batch loads (F.01.4) and streaming events (F.01.5).
**Options.** F.01.1.A SaaS CDC Connector • F.01.1.B OpenFlow (Native CDC via Log) • F.01.1.C Custom CDC via Log Shipping.
Native log‑based CDC pipeline to Snowflake using OpenFlow.
Option Overview: Native log‑based CDC pipeline to Snowflake using OpenFlow.
